com.infosupport.activity

Class OCRActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.infosupport.activity.OCRActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskDelegate, java.lang.Runnable

    public class OCRActivity
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Runnable, TaskDelegate
    OCRActivity makes a picture and then uses OpenALPR library to read the plates.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Mike
